divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife and kids were going out.I walked out side and looked up.I seen two objects flying side by side.may be from were I was looking in the sky.it could of been a few miles apart.what made me keep looking was the speed that they were traveling.what caught my attention was that.they changed directions in a blink of an eye,and was gone.I never told anyone,but my wife and kids.I tell the same story all the time as it happened yesterday.I always look in the sky day in night.it was at that split second.I looked up as we were going to the car.it looked light to bright lights circled shaped and bright as a star.they were apart side by side one was a little behind.then it made a u turn and was gone.I never seen anything like it.I never in a million years would of thought.that ufos existed,until then.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Paterson
There were no other sightings in Paterson on or around November 12th 2008
Summary: Two bright white light made a u turn in the sky.
